src_original: Wal_1 vitarkā viditā utpadyaṁte viditās tiṣṭaṁti viditā adhyastaṁgacchaṁti / Wal_2 idam api yūyam ānanda tathāgatasyāścaryādbhutadharmaṁ dhārayata / evam āścaryādbhutadharmasamanvāgata ānanda tathāgataḥ /
tgt_original: 「如來能知受起、住、滅，想起、住、滅，觀起、住、滅，此乃如來甚奇甚特未曾有法，汝當受持。

src_original: Wal_11 yāvaṁta ānanda bhikṣavo gandhamādanaṁ caityam upaniḥśṛtya viharaṁti tān sarvān upasthānaśālāyāṁ saṁnipātaya /
tgt_original: 「香塔左右現諸比丘，普勅令集講堂。

src_original: Wal_12 evaṁ bhadaṁtāyuṣmān ānanda bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yāvaṁto bhikṣavo gandhamādanaṁ caityam upaniḥṣṛtya viharaṁti tān sarvān upasthānaśālāyāṁ saṁnipātayāmāsa / saṁnipātya śirasā bhagavataḥ pādau vaṁttvaikānte asthāt /
Wal_13 ekāntasthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavaṁtam idam avocat /
Wal_14 yāvaṁto bhadanta bhikṣavo gandhamādanacaityam upaniḥśṛtya viharaṁti sarve te upasthānaśālāyāṁ saṁnipatitāḥ / yasyedānīṁ bhagavān kālaṁ manyate /
Wal_15 atha bhagavān utthāyāsanād yenopasthānaśālā tenopasaṁkrānta upasaṁkramya prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat / Wal_16 niṣaṇṇo bhagavāṁ bhikṣūn āmaṁtrayāmāsa /
tgt_original: 」爾時，世尊即詣講堂，就座而坐，告諸比丘：

src_original: Wal_17 tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo ye mayā dharmāḥ svayam abhijñāya sākṣīkṛtvopasaṁpadya praveditās
tgt_original: 「汝等當知我以此法自身作證，成最正覺，謂：

src_original: tadyathā catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni catvāro ṛddhipādāḥ pañcendriyāṇi pañca balāni sapta bodhyṅgāny āryāṣṭāṅgo mārgaḥ tatra vaḥ sarvaiḥ sahitaiḥ samagraiḥ
tgt_original: 『四念處、四意斷、四神足、四禪、五根、五力、七覺意、賢聖八道。

src_original: saṁmodamānair avivadadbhir ekāgrair ekoddeśair ekakṣīrodakabhūtaiḥ … dīpayamānaiḥ
tgt_original: 』汝等宜當於此法中和同敬順，勿生諍訟，同一師受，同一水乳，於我法中宜勤受學，共相熾然，共相娛樂。

src_original: sukhasparśaṁ vihartavyam / Wal_18 tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavo ye mayā dharmā ākhyātās tadyathā sūtraṁ geyaṁ vyākaraṇaṁ gāthodānā nidānāvadānā itivṛttakajātakavaipulyādbhutadharmopadeśās te dharmā bhavadbhiḥ sādhu
tgt_original: 比丘當知我於此法自身作證，布現於彼，謂： 『《貫經》、《祇夜經》、《受記經》、《偈經》、《法句經》、《相應經》、《本緣經》、《天本經》、《廣經》、《未曾有經》、《證喻經》、《大教經》。

src_original: ca suṣṭhu codgrahītavyā udgṛhya dhārayitavyā dhārayitvā tulayitavyāḥ tulayitvā niśāmayitavyā niśāmya tathā tathā pratipattavyam /
tgt_original: 』汝等當善受持，稱量分別，隨事修行。

src_original: Wal_19 tat kasmād dhetoḥ / acireṇa tathāgatasya parinirvāṇaṁ bhaviṣyati / trayāṇāṁ māsānām

Wal_3 atha bhagavān āyuṣmantam ānandam āmaṁtrayāmāsa / āgamayānanda yena gandhamādanaṁ caityaṁ tenopasaṁkramiṣyāvaḥ / Wal_4 evaṁ bhadaṁta āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt / Wal_5 atha bhagavān utthāyāsanād yena gandhamādanaṁ caityaṁ tenopasaṁkramati / āyuṣmān ānando niṣīdanam aṁsenāropya bhagavaṁtaṁ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ … myānulomatayā / Wal_6 atha bhagavāṁ gandhamādanaṁ caityam abhyavagāhya yenānyatamaṁ vṛkṣamūlaṁ tenopasaṁkramati / upasaṁkramya āyuṣmaṁtam ānandam āmaṁtrayāmāsa /
Wal_7 prajñapayānandāsmiṁ vṛkṣamūle tathāgatasya niṣīdanaṁ pṛṣṭhī me āglāyati tāṁ tāvad āyāmayiṣye /
tgt_original: 「俱詣香塔，在一樹下，敷座而坐。

src_original: Wal_8 evaṁ bhadaṁtāyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya tasmiṁ vṛkṣamūle bhagavato niṣīdanaṁ prajñapayāmāsa / Wal_9 nyaṣīdad bhagavāṁ prajñapta evāsane /āyuṣmān apy ānando bhagavata ekāṁte nyaṣīdat /
